.. _wx.lib.pubsub.core.topicargspecimpl.SenderMissingReqdMsgDataError:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.pubsub.core.topicargspecimpl.SenderMissingReqdMsgDataError**
==========================================================================================================================================

Raised when a sendMessage() is missing arguments tagged as
'required' by pubsub topic of message.



|
